Shop Supplements for Healthy Hair, Skin & Nails at Holland & Barrett

Your hair, skin, and nails play a vital role in your overall appearance and health. At Holland & Barrett, we offer a wide range of hair, skin, and nails vitamins designed to support natural beauty from the inside out. Whether youre looking for biotin for hair growth, collagen for skin elasticity, or zinc for nail strength, we have the perfect supplement to fit your needs.

Which Vitamins and Supplements should you take for your Hair, Skin and Nails?

Hair, skin, and nails vitamins contain essential nutrients that promote healthy growth and maintenance. The most common supplements for your hair, skin and nails include:

  • Biotin Also known as vitamin B7, biotin supports normal hair, skin, and nail health.

  • Collagen The most abundant protein in your skin, collagen helps maintain skin elasticity and hydration.

  • Zinc Aids in cell regeneration and supports nail strength.

What other supplements could help support your natural beauty?

  • Hyaluronic Acid Enhances skin moisture and reduces the appearance of fine lines.

  • Vitamin C Contributes to collagen formation and protects skin cells from oxidative stress.

  • B-Complex Vitamins As well as biotin, riboflavin (vitamin B2) and niacin (vitamin B3) also play a role in maintaining normal, healthy skin.

  • Omega-3 Fatty Acids Helps keep skin smooth and hydrated.

Benefits of Hair, Skin & Nails Supplements

Regular intake of vitamins and supplements tailored for hair, skin, and nails could provide multiple benefits:

  • Stronger, Healthier Hair Reduce hair breakage and promote natural shine.

  • Glowing Skin Maintain hydration, elasticity, and a youthful appearance.

  • Resilient Nails Minimize brittleness and improve overall nail health.

  • Protection from Environmental Damage Antioxidants help defend against oxidising air pollution, and UV exposure.

Choosing the Best Hair, Skin & Nails Vitamins

At Holland & Barrett, we stock a variety of hair, skin, and nails supplements in different forms, including tablets, capsules, gummies, and powders. Whether you prefer vegetarian, vegan, or gluten-free options, youll find something to suit your lifestyle.

FAQs

How does collagen help keep hair, skin and nails healthy?

Oh collagen, how could we live without you? Well, we cant really Its the most plentiful protein in our body. You can find it in skin, bones and in every muscle and tendon, creating the structure of the human body.

 

Unfortunately, as we age, collagen production starts to wind down. This process usually starts around the age of 25 and is why our skin slowly begins to lose elasticity and strength, and our hair and nails can start to weaken.

What are the best minerals/best vitamins for hair?

Multiple vitamins and minerals come together to keep your hair looking and feeling thick, shiny and healthy for that hair you cant help but flick. Choose a multivitamin for hair like Holland & Barrett Vitamins for the Hair, or if you know youre lacking in a certain vitamin, choose a more specific supplement, e.g. a Zinc Hair Supplement.

 

- Zinc: an essential vitamin your body needs to perform many functions, zinc is important for maintaining healthy hair, skin and nails

- Biotin: also known as vitamin B7, biotin helps the body to metabolise carbohydrates, fats and amino acids, as well as supporting hair health

- Copper: grey and white hair, it happens to us all eventually, but it doesnt mean we have to like it! Copper can help to maintain your hair pigment

What are the best supplements and vitamins for skin?

We all love our moisturising body butters, creams, exfoliators, cleansers, toners, the list goes on. But a little love on the inside can make your skin even healthier than using external products alone.

 

Niacin: also known as vitamin B3, niacin is a water-soluble vitamin that aids normal skin and normal function of mucous membranes.

 

Riboflavin: aka vitamin B2, riboflavin is involved in mucus secretion.

 

Vitamin C: this vitamin is essential for the production of collagen, which can be found in our hair, skin, nails, bones, joints and many other parts of the body.

What are the best supplements and vitamins for nails?

Brittle nails prone to breaking? No thank you. Give your nails a healthy boost of nutrients with Holland & Barrett Super Nails Formula. Read about some nail-friendly ingredients below:

- Zinc: a very important mineral for healthy nail maintenance, zinc helps to maintain the normal structure and harnesses of nails

- Selenium: a trace mineral naturally found in foods and soil, selenium helps to keep your nails healthy

Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

Targeting Cookies
